00018 void Clock::sleep(double sleepDuration){
00019   if( sleepDuration>0.0 ) {
00020     struct timespec tv;
00021     tv.tv_sec = (time_t) sleepDuration;
00022     tv.tv_nsec = (long) ((sleepDuration - tv.tv_sec) * 1e+9);
00023       
00024     while( tv.tv_sec>0 || tv.tv_nsec>0 ){
00025       int rval = nanosleep(&tv, &tv);
00026        
00027       if(rval == 0) // We are done sleeping
00028        return;
00029 
00030       if( EINTR!=errno )
00031        throw ErrnoExcept("Clock::sleep");
00032     }
00033   }
00034 }
